animation_nodes.name: Animation nodes
animation_nodes.description: Node based visual scripting system designed for motion graphics in Blender.
animation_nodes.author: Jacques Lucke

textools_blender.name: TexTools
textools_blender.description: TexTools is a UV and Texture tool set for 3dsMax created several years ago. This open repository will port in time several of the UV tools to Blender in python.
textools_blender.author: Sav Martin

renderman_for_blender.name: Renderman
renderman_for_blender.description: Blender render addon for Pixar's RenderMan 21.0 and beyond.
renderman_for_blender.author: furby-tm

rigflex.name: addonm
rigflex.description: Simple soft body for Blender armatures
rigflex.author: nerk987

slap_it.name: Slap it!
slap_it.description: A simple decals addon for Blender 2.8+
slap_it.author: artempoletsky

blender_gis.name: BlenderGIS
blender_gis.description: Blender addons to make the bridge between Blender and geographic data.
blender_gis.author: domlysz
